content.title: Riverside Resort
content.text: Anantara Riverside boasts a unique setting, with tropical gardens overlooking the Chao Phraya providing a resort feel in the middle of vibrant Bangkok. Get out and explore all the city has to offer, then return to tranquil relaxation. Enjoy signature dining experiences, from sizzling teppanyaki and Pacific Rim cuisine, to a royal Thai feast on a restored rice barge.
content.text2: Anantara Riverside boasts a unique setting, with tropical gardens overlooking the Chao Phraya providing a resort feel in the middle of vibrant Bangkok. Get out and explore all the city has to offer, then return to tranquil relaxation. Enjoy signature dining experiences, from sizzling teppanyaki and Pacific Rim cuisine, to a royal Thai feast on a restored rice barge.
content.features:
• 281 guestrooms and 95 suites
  • Lush tropical garden and riverside setting
  • Extensive Anantara Spa with signature treatments
  • World-class dining and entertainment options

content.title: Siam Hotel
content.text: Immerse yourself in urban delights at an iconic Bangkok address. Elegant rooms and suites offer a blend of traditional Thai décor and contemporary amenities. Relish authentic experiences with a Streetwise Guru, or shop elite department stores just around the corner. Revel in Bangkok’s finest dining across 11 diverse and award-winning venues.
content.text2: Immerse yourself in urban delights at an iconic Bangkok address. Elegant rooms and suites offer a blend of traditional Thai décor and contemporary amenities. Relish authentic experiences with a Streetwise Guru, or shop elite department stores just around the corner. Revel in Bangkok’s finest dining across 11 diverse and award-winning venues.
content.features:
• 354 guestrooms and suites 
  • Kasara Executive Lounge access and benefits in select rooms and suites
  • A sought-after central location just steps from the BTS skytrain

content.title: Loy Pela Voyages
content.text: Journey back in time and discover the Chao Phraya River’s majestic wonders. Step aboard our exquisite 100-year-old rice barge, meticulously rebuilt from solid teak and lavishly converted to its present splendour. Set off on a three-day cruise aboard the Manohra Dream for Ayutthaya.  Discover sacred sites, cultural heritage and immerse yourself in authentic local experiences.
content.text2: Journey back in time and discover the Chao Phraya River’s majestic wonders. Step aboard our exquisite 100-year-old rice barge, meticulously rebuilt from solid teak and lavishly converted to its present splendour. Set off on a three-day cruise aboard the Manohra Dream for Ayutthaya.  Discover sacred sites, cultural heritage and immerse yourself in authentic local experiences.
content.features:
• Private cruise for up to eight adults
  • Four impeccably-appointed Staterooms with ensuite bathrooms
  • Upper decks for living and dining
  • Chef and kitchen on board
  • Separate crew quarters

content.title: Chiang Mai Resort
content.text: Northern Thailand's Chiang Mai is a mecca of Buddhist temples, ancient Lanna ruins, colourful hill tribes and traditional artisans' villages. And with Anantara Chiang Mai Resort's central riverfront location, get out and explore all the old capital has to offer. Sample the best street food and slow-brewed coffee as recommended by our insider gurus. Delve into local culture with Muay Thai boxing, healing spa therapies and cooking class adventures at the resort. Revel in river serenity and signature Anantara luxuries.
content.text2: Northern Thailand's Chiang Mai is a mecca of Buddhist temples, ancient Lanna ruins, colourful hill tribes and traditional artisans' villages. And with Anantara Chiang Mai Resort's central riverfront location, get out and explore all the old capital has to offer. Sample the best street food and slow-brewed coffee as recommended by our insider gurus. Delve into local culture with Muay Thai boxing, healing spa therapies and cooking class adventures at the resort. Revel in river serenity and signature Anantara luxuries.
content.features:
• Riverside serenity in the heart of Chiang Mai
  • 52 rooms, 32 suites and 26 serviced suites
  • 100-year-old heritage house for dining and events
  • Thai boxing, cooking class and spa experiences

content.title: Chiang Mai Serviced Suites
content.text: Escape to the cool cultured north of ancient Lanna ruins, glittering temples atop verdant mountains and the colourful hill tribes surrounding. Chiang Mai offers the perfect blend of relaxation, adventure and discovery. Find your rhythm at Anantara Chiang Mai Serviced Suites. Perfect for families and groups of friends, longer stay guests or business trips, Anantara Chiang Mai Serviced Suites blends all the trappings of a luxurious home with attentive service and full use of the dining and recreational facilities at our sister resort across the road.
content.text2: Escape to the cool cultured north of ancient Lanna ruins, glittering temples atop verdant mountains and the colourful hill tribes surrounding. Chiang Mai offers the perfect blend of relaxation, adventure and discovery. Find your rhythm at Anantara Chiang Mai Serviced Suites. Perfect for families and groups of friends, longer stay guests or business trips, Anantara Chiang Mai Serviced Suites blends all the trappings of a luxurious home with attentive service and full use of the dining and recreational facilities at our sister resort across the road.
content.features:
• 26 suites
  • Rooftop pool with city and mountain views
  • In-suite personal chef experience and Spice Spoons cooking class
  • Anantara Spa and fitness centre at Anantara Chiang Mai Resort
  • Pet Allowed

content.title: Golden Triangle Resort
content.text: Perched on a jungle ridge overlooking three countries, Anantara Golden Triangle brings otherworldly experiences to life. Wake up to the sound of elephants playing in the misty valley below. Wander the jungle with them on their daily walk. Spa in the midst of 160 acres of lush rice paddies. Leave stress behind with an all-inclusive package taking care of all the details.
content.text2: Perched on a jungle ridge overlooking three countries, Anantara Golden Triangle brings otherworldly experiences to life. Wake up to the sound of elephants playing in the misty valley below. Wander the jungle with them on their daily walk. Spa in the midst of 160 acres of lush rice paddies. Leave stress behind with an all-inclusive package taking care of all the details.
content.features:
• Remote jungle setting with three-country views
  • 40 rooms, 15 suites and 6 family suites
  • Mekhong Explorer gastronomic and cultural experience
  • Award-winning elephant camp, scientific research and conservation programme
  • Golden Triangle Luxury Explorer Package with elephants, spa, cooking and cultural experiences
  • Dusk-to-dawn Jungle Bubble experience with dinner and breakfast amidst the elephants

content.title: Hua Hin Resort
content.text: The original Anantara a few hours south of Bangkok is a beachfront sanctuary modelled on a traditional Thai village. Low-rise gabled buildings dot landscaped gardens and lotus-filled lagoons. Explore the royal seaside retreat, from vineyards and teak palaces to the thrill of a water park. Dine on fresh seafood overlooking the ocean and unwind at the award-winning Anantara Spa.
content.text2: The original Anantara a few hours south of Bangkok is a beachfront sanctuary modelled on a traditional Thai village. Low-rise gabled buildings dot landscaped gardens and lotus-filled lagoons. Explore the royal seaside retreat, from vineyards and teak palaces to the thrill of a water park. Dine on fresh seafood overlooking the ocean and unwind at the award-winning Anantara Spa.
content.features:
• 190 rooms and suites
  • Lagoon privileges for suite guests
  • Thai spa, cooking and Muay Thai experiences
  • Easy access to historical attractions, shopping, theme parks, vineyards and golf courses

content.title: Mai Khao Villas
content.text: An all-villa oasis on Phuket's northern tip invites island unwinding in luxurious Anantara style. Laze in your private pool. Dine in your sala perched over the lagoon. Wander long stretches of golden beach at sunset. Charter a yacht to explore the iconic limestone cliffs of Phang Nga or the world-class reefs of the Similans.
content.text2: An all-villa oasis on Phuket's northern tip invites island unwinding in luxurious Anantara style. Laze in your private pool. Dine in your sala perched over the lagoon. Wander long stretches of golden beach at sunset. Charter a yacht to explore the iconic limestone cliffs of Phang Nga or the world-class reefs of the Similans.
content.features:
• Only 15 minutes from Phuket International Airport
  • 83 pool villas set around a tranquil lagoon, and 30 pool pavilions located in the adjacent tropical gardens of Avani+ Mai Khao.
  • Drink at the award-winning Tree House and beachside dining
  • Award-winning Anantara Spa

content.title: Layan Resort
content.text:
Hide away in a peaceful cove overlooking the Andaman, or head out in search of adventure. Dive some of the most pristine sites in the world. Island hop by private yacht or speedboat. Experience Thailand’s rich culture with authentic cuisine, spa journeys and the art of Muay Thai.

Located on Phuket’s western coast, just a 20-minute drive from the airport, Anantara Layan Phuket Resort is ideal for honeymoons, romantic escapes, family getaways and spectacular weddings, with a unique chapel setting overlooking the ocean.
content.text2:
Hide away in a peaceful cove overlooking the Andaman, or head out in search of adventure. Dive some of the most pristine sites in the world. Island hop by private yacht or speedboat. Experience Thailand’s rich culture with authentic cuisine, spa journeys and the art of Muay Thai.

Located on Phuket’s western coast, just a 20-minute drive from the airport, Anantara Layan Phuket Resort is ideal for honeymoons, romantic escapes, family getaways and spectacular weddings, with a unique chapel setting overlooking the ocean.
content.features:
• 30 suites, 46 pool villas, and 15 pool residences
  • The island’s favourite bubbly breakfast and authentic Thai Cuisine
  • Muay Thai stadium, Anantara Spa, and Thai cooking Classes
  • Cliffside wedding chapel
  • Avadina Hills by Anantara

content.title: Layan Residences
content.text:
Be master of your own universe poised over the sparkling Andaman. Wake up to panoramic views, spend blissful days by your private infinity pool, and have your every whim catered to by a live-in butler and team of expert chefs, personal trainers and spa therapists on call. 

Located only 20 minutes from Phuket International Airport, Layan Residences by Anantara offers the ideal tropical escape. Revel in tranquillity or head out across the waters in search of adventure by private yacht. Enjoy unfettered access to the facilities and services of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort adjacent.
content.text2:
Be master of your own universe poised over the sparkling Andaman. Wake up to panoramic views, spend blissful days by your private infinity pool, and have your every whim catered to by a live-in butler and team of expert chefs, personal trainers and spa therapists on call. 

Located only 20 minutes from Phuket International Airport, Layan Residences by Anantara offers the ideal tropical escape. Revel in tranquillity or head out across the waters in search of adventure by private yacht. Enjoy unfettered access to the facilities and services of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort adjacent.
content.features:
• 15 two-storey sea view residences
  • VIP airport arrival - departure and live-in butler service
  • In-residence dining, spa journeys and yoga
  • Anantara Layan Phuket Resort facilities and services

content.title: Vacation Club Phuket
content.text: Your island home-away-from-home is tranquil, contemporary and spacious. All suites and pool villas are equipped with kitchens and laundries ideal for long vacations. Host a private barbecue by the pool. Hide away in the Anantara Spa adjacent with blissful journeys for two. Wander down to Mai Khao Beach for ocean thrills and stunning sunsets.
content.text2: Your island home-away-from-home is tranquil, contemporary and spacious. All suites and pool villas are equipped with kitchens and laundries ideal for long vacations. Host a private barbecue by the pool. Hide away in the Anantara Spa adjacent with blissful journeys for two. Wander down to Mai Khao Beach for ocean thrills and stunning sunsets.
content.features:
• 58 suites and 93 pool villas
  • Fully equipped for long vacations
  • 300 m from Mai Khao Beach

content.title: Bophut Resort
content.text: Welcome to an island dream made reality. Long a favoured getaway for the elite, Koh Samui in the Gulf of Thailand is easily accessible with dozens of international flights a day, yet retains its natural laidback charm. Laze on golden sands and take in endless stretches of turquoise extending towards the horizon. Revel in coastal pleasures and stylish beachfront dining. Windsurf across the waters or immerse yourself in a culinary class celebrating Thai specialities. Dive into culture and relaxation in a tropical beachfront setting.
content.text2: Welcome to an island dream made reality. Long a favoured getaway for the elite, Koh Samui in the Gulf of Thailand is easily accessible with dozens of international flights a day, yet retains its natural laidback charm. Laze on golden sands and take in endless stretches of turquoise extending towards the horizon. Revel in coastal pleasures and stylish beachfront dining. Windsurf across the waters or immerse yourself in a culinary class celebrating Thai specialities. Dive into culture and relaxation in a tropical beachfront setting.
content.features:
• 106 rooms, suites and beachfront pool suites
  • Beachfront infinity pool and dining 
  • Garden spa with standalone treatment suites
  • Thai cuisine, cooking classes, Muay Thai and massage
  • A short 3 minutes stroll to Fisherman's Village and Coco Tam's

content.title: Lawana Resort
content.text: Located on the eastern shore of Koh Samui looking out onto open ocean, Anantara Lawana offers relaxed seclusion only a short stroll from buzzing Chaweng Beach. Laid out like a traditional Thai village around palm-fringed pools, the resort's design is inspired by the island's Chinese merchant communities. Gaze across turquoise waters from the beachfront infinity pool. Take in the ocean sunset from the treetops. Explore cultural heritage or peruse the local market to connect with island life.
content.text2: Located on the eastern shore of Koh Samui looking out onto open ocean, Anantara Lawana offers relaxed seclusion only a short stroll from buzzing Chaweng Beach. Laid out like a traditional Thai village around palm-fringed pools, the resort's design is inspired by the island's Chinese merchant communities. Gaze across turquoise waters from the beachfront infinity pool. Take in the ocean sunset from the treetops. Explore cultural heritage or peruse the local market to connect with island life.
content.features:
• Prime location on buzzing Chaweng Beach
  • 122 recently renovated guestrooms and pool villas
  • Beachside infinity pool 
  • Kids’ club
  • Fine flavours and unique dining at Tree Tops 
  • World-class meetings and weddings facilities

content.title: Rasananda Villas
content.text: With only 64 pool suites and pool villas dotting lush jungle overlooking white sands, Anantara Rasananda brings castaway fantasies to life. Salute the sun on a cliffside yoga platform. Dine on fresh seafood with your toes in the sand. An idyllic island off the coast of Southern Thailand, Koh Phangan is known for crystal-clear waters, laid-back vibes and world-famous full moon parties.
content.text2: With only 64 pool suites and pool villas dotting lush jungle overlooking white sands, Anantara Rasananda brings castaway fantasies to life. Salute the sun on a cliffside yoga platform. Dine on fresh seafood with your toes in the sand. An idyllic island off the coast of Southern Thailand, Koh Phangan is known for crystal-clear waters, laid-back vibes and world-famous full moon parties.
content.features:
• 64 pool suites and pool villas
  • Set amongst towering palms and crystal sea waters
  • Luxury spa in an island jungle garden
  • Beachfront villas on one of the best beaches in Thailand

content.title: Dhigu Resort
content.text:
Explore the beauty of the Maldives, with unforgettable experiences both above and below the Indian Ocean surface. Surf the waves. Freedive the deep blue. Spa over water with baby reef sharks swimming peacefully below. 

With three sister islands to explore for dining, recreation and relaxation, and the ocean a few steps from your luxury villa or over water suite, Anantara Dhigu offers the perfect setting for adventurous family escapes.
content.text2:
Explore the beauty of the Maldives, with unforgettable experiences both above and below the Indian Ocean surface. Surf the waves. Freedive the deep blue. Spa over water with baby reef sharks swimming peacefully below. 

With three sister islands to explore for dining, recreation and relaxation, and the ocean a few steps from your luxury villa or over water suite, Anantara Dhigu offers the perfect setting for adventurous family escapes.
content.features:
• 110 beach villas and over water suites
  • Only 30 minutes by speedboat from Malé International Airport
  • Over water spa, surf school and water sports centre
  • Exciting indoor & outdoor activities for our young guests
  • Access to facilities at sister resort Veli (for guests over 18 years or families with dinner reservations)

content.title: Kihavah Villas
content.text:
Escape to spacious villas over water or on a stretch of private beach. Indulgent touches of island luxury abound from a private pool in every villa to exotic stargazing experiences and award-winning dining. 

Set within a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, the resort is perfect for exploring the world’s most treasured reefs, where manta rays gather to breed. Dine with the fishes in an underwater wine cellar. Discover Maldivian culture with a day trip to local islands.
content.text2:
Escape to spacious villas over water or on a stretch of private beach. Indulgent touches of island luxury abound from a private pool in every villa to exotic stargazing experiences and award-winning dining. 

Set within a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, the resort is perfect for exploring the world’s most treasured reefs, where manta rays gather to breed. Dine with the fishes in an underwater wine cellar. Discover Maldivian culture with a day trip to local islands.
content.features:
• A private island in a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve
  • 80 beach and over water pool villas and residences
  • Award-winning underwater dining
  • The Maldives’ only over water observatory

content.title: Naladhu Private Island
content.text:
Elegance enveloped in ocean hues. Naladhu is a pristine private island in the South Malé Atoll. With just 19 colonial beach houses scattered around the island, cherish quiet seclusion, idyllic views and bespoke experiences. 

Savour intimate dining affairs in locations yours alone. Cruise the Indian Ocean on a private yacht, sailing into the tranquillity of a hypnotic sunset. Enjoy unobtrusive yet attentive service, with your very own dedicated butler.
content.text2:
Elegance enveloped in ocean hues. Naladhu is a pristine private island in the South Malé Atoll. With just 19 colonial beach houses scattered around the island, cherish quiet seclusion, idyllic views and bespoke experiences. 

Savour intimate dining affairs in locations yours alone. Cruise the Indian Ocean on a private yacht, sailing into the tranquillity of a hypnotic sunset. Enjoy unobtrusive yet attentive service, with your very own dedicated butler.
content.features:
• Private island with just 20 houses, all with private pool
  • 24-hour dedicated Kuwaanu service
  • Endless experiences and activities
  • No-menu dining concept

content.title: Veli Resort
content.text:
Indulge in romantic island life in the midst of Indian Ocean beauty. Choose to hideaway in your overwater, ocean or beach villa for two, kissed by the sun and sea breeze, or venture out in search of authentic experiences. 

Dine at sea, on a deserted island, or explore the options on sister island Dhigu. Movie under the stars. Explore the teeming waters surrounding the resort, whether diving below, surfing the waves, or setting sail for the horizon.
content.text2:
Indulge in romantic island life in the midst of Indian Ocean beauty. Choose to hideaway in your overwater, ocean or beach villa for two, kissed by the sun and sea breeze, or venture out in search of authentic experiences. 

Dine at sea, on a deserted island, or explore the options on sister island Dhigu. Movie under the stars. Explore the teeming waters surrounding the resort, whether diving below, surfing the waves, or setting sail for the horizon.
content.features:
• 67 over water, ocean and beach villas
  • Only 30-minutes by speedboat from Malé International Airport
  • Couples’ spa journeys, Cinema under the stars on your own private island, and Dining by Design
  • Access to facilities at sister resort Anantara Dhigu

content.title: Niyama Private Islands
content.text: Cast away, together. Find a very private setting for intimate, one-of-a-kind experiences. With twin islands Play and Chill, Niyama offers the luxury of choice, catering to your holiday desires and letting you live large in a world unto yourselves.
content.text2: Cast away, together. Find a very private setting for intimate, one-of-a-kind experiences. With twin islands Play and Chill, Niyama offers the luxury of choice, catering to your holiday desires and letting you live large in a world unto yourselves.
content.features:
• 134 villas and pavilions – from 1 to 3 Bedrooms
  • The Crescent – a private playground of 5 pool villas
  • Only 45 minutes by seaplane from Velana International Airport
  • 10 unique dining experiences
  • Explorers Kids Club for young VIPs
  • Drift Spa by Niyama

content.title: Angkor Resort
content.text:
Explore ancient Khmer legends and immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of history in this ancient kingdom at Anantara Angkor Resort.

Wherever you find your inspiration, allow Anantara to guide your journey, with dedicated experience butlers on hand to facilitate your ultimate adventure. Explore legendary temples, delight in bespoke local experiences or relax and let your stresses and worries melt away with unlimited relaxation in our spa.
content.text2:
Explore ancient Khmer legends and immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of history in this ancient kingdom at Anantara Angkor Resort.

Wherever you find your inspiration, allow Anantara to guide your journey, with dedicated experience butlers on hand to facilitate your ultimate adventure. Explore legendary temples, delight in bespoke local experiences or relax and let your stresses and worries melt away with unlimited relaxation in our spa.
content.features:
• 39 Khmer-style suites set around a courtyard pool
  • 10 minutes from Siem Reap, 15 minutes from Angkor Wat
  • VIP tours arranged by your personal Experience Butler

content.title: Guiyang Resort
content.text: Situated in Guizhou’s Forest City, only 15 minutes from the airport, Anantara Guiyang Resort opens the doors to nature’s beauty and thousands of years of dynastic splendour. Luxuriate in elegant havens boasting Oriental charm and sweeping karst mountain views. Visit breathtaking caves and waterfalls and colourful ethnic minority villages. Hide away in our heavenly spa, with a diverse range of treatments inspired by a local love of tea.
content.text2: Situated in Guizhou’s Forest City, only 15 minutes from the airport, Anantara Guiyang Resort opens the doors to nature’s beauty and thousands of years of dynastic splendour. Luxuriate in elegant havens boasting Oriental charm and sweeping karst mountain views. Visit breathtaking caves and waterfalls and colourful ethnic minority villages. Hide away in our heavenly spa, with a diverse range of treatments inspired by a local love of tea.
content.features:
• 218 rooms, suites and pool villas
  • A lush resort setting and karst mountain backdrop
  • Private banqueting at The Ancient Town
  • Anantara Spa with mountain views

content.title: Xishuangbanna Resort
content.text: Situated in the southern Hengduan Mountains where the Luosuo River eventually turns into the mighty Mekong, Anantara Xishuangbanna Resort invites you to immerse in local cultures or simply take it easy. Partake in traditional tea rituals, savour local Dai cuisine, meander the hillside plantations or unwind with a spa treatment.
content.text2: Situated in the southern Hengduan Mountains where the Luosuo River eventually turns into the mighty Mekong, Anantara Xishuangbanna Resort invites you to immerse in local cultures or simply take it easy. Partake in traditional tea rituals, savour local Dai cuisine, meander the hillside plantations or unwind with a spa treatment.
content.features:
• 103 rooms and pool villas
  • Overlooking Xishuangbanna Tropical Botanical Garden
  • Day trips to hill tribe villages, Pu’er tea plantations and elephant reserve
  • An hour’s drive from Xishuangbanna Jinghong International Airport and high-speed railway station
  • Exquisite dining options and tea room
  • Anantara Spa and gym

content.title: Uluwatu Resort
content.text: Located on the southern tip of the Island of the Gods, Anantara Uluwatu Bali Resort is an all-suite-and-villa cliffside paradise boasting innovative architecture and untamed natural beauty. Take in the crashing ocean below from the resort infinity pool - or indulge in a private pool villa. Ride the waves of Impossible Beach which draws surfers from around the world. Bali is a cultural mecca of temples and artists. Let Anantara guide you on insider explorations of the island.
content.text2: Located on the southern tip of the Island of the Gods, Anantara Uluwatu Bali Resort is an all-suite-and-villa cliffside paradise boasting innovative architecture and untamed natural beauty. Take in the crashing ocean below from the resort infinity pool - or indulge in a private pool villa. Ride the waves of Impossible Beach which draws surfers from around the world. Bali is a cultural mecca of temples and artists. Let Anantara guide you on insider explorations of the island.
content.features:
• 73 suites, pool villas and penthouses
  • Multi-layered ocean front swimming pool 
  • Contemporary clifftop wedding chapel

content.title: Vacation Club Bali
content.text: Slip away to beautiful Bali and find your island home-away-from-home in Legian. Ideally located between buzzing Seminyak and Kuta, both a five-minute walk along the beach, Anantara Vacation Club Legian Bali offers convenience and tranquillity. Play on soft sands across the road, surfing by day and stopping to take in magnificent sunsets. Explore the neighbourhood's local street eats and cafes.
content.text2: Slip away to beautiful Bali and find your island home-away-from-home in Legian. Ideally located between buzzing Seminyak and Kuta, both a five-minute walk along the beach, Anantara Vacation Club Legian Bali offers convenience and tranquillity. Play on soft sands across the road, surfing by day and stopping to take in magnificent sunsets. Explore the neighbourhood's local street eats and cafes.
content.features:
• Hidden away oceanside location 
  • 28 studios and self-catering apartment suites
  • Pool, gym and spa
  • Conveniences including parking, in-room dining and laundry

content.title: Desaru Coast Resort
content.text: Offering a range of luxury accommodation nestled in lush tropical gardens, Anantara Desaru Coast Resort & Villas offers a serene escape on golden Malaysian shores. Low-rise buildings and stand-alone villas overlook the gardens, lagoon and ocean, while expansive residences offer families and groups utmost privacy with an infinity pool, full kitchen and chef and butler service.
content.text2: Offering a range of luxury accommodation nestled in lush tropical gardens, Anantara Desaru Coast Resort & Villas offers a serene escape on golden Malaysian shores. Low-rise buildings and stand-alone villas overlook the gardens, lagoon and ocean, while expansive residences offer families and groups utmost privacy with an infinity pool, full kitchen and chef and butler service.
content.features:
• 116 rooms, villas and residences  
  • Two pools, including a beachfront infinity pool
  • Malaysian, Thai and international signature dining 
  • Family activities and experiences, plus kids and teens clubs

content.title: Iko Mauritius Resort
content.text: Retreat to a luxury coastal sanctuary on the undiscovered southeast shores of Mauritius. Laze on golden beaches or at the resort’s infinity pool. Taste exotic Creole flavours. Salute the sun with yoga, meditation and Tai Chi. Explore local culture and uncover natural wonders. Rejuvenate with hammam spa rituals or snorkel in Blue Bay Marine Park, a trove of marine biodiversity.
content.text2: Retreat to a luxury coastal sanctuary on the undiscovered southeast shores of Mauritius. Laze on golden beaches or at the resort’s infinity pool. Taste exotic Creole flavours. Salute the sun with yoga, meditation and Tai Chi. Explore local culture and uncover natural wonders. Rejuvenate with hammam spa rituals or snorkel in Blue Bay Marine Park, a trove of marine biodiversity.
content.features:
• 171 rooms, suites and villas
  • Untouched beach, close to the nature
  • 10 minutes from the airport
  • Tailored activity and wellness programmes

content.title: Bazaruto Island Resort
content.text: Fulfil your escapist dreams on the exotic island of Bazaruto. Located off the Indian Ocean coast of Mozambique, revel in boutique villas offering dazzling views of natural beauty. Set out on dugong, turtle, dolphin and whale watching trips. Explore the island on horseback or enjoy a range of thrilling water sports. Revitalise at our expansive spa with specialist hydro facilities to invigorate and refresh.
content.text2: Fulfil your escapist dreams on the exotic island of Bazaruto. Located off the Indian Ocean coast of Mozambique, revel in boutique villas offering dazzling views of natural beauty. Set out on dugong, turtle, dolphin and whale watching trips. Explore the island on horseback or enjoy a range of thrilling water sports. Revitalise at our expansive spa with specialist hydro facilities to invigorate and refresh.
content.features:
• Only 44 luxury villas dotting the coast
  • World-class diving, sailing, snorkelling, deep-sea fishing 
  • Sunset dune boarding
  • Embrace the culinary culture of Mozambique with Spice Spoons
  • Award-winning Anantara Spa 
  • Private airstrip and helipad
  • Whale watching

content.title: Medjumbe Island Resort
content.text: Uncover the romance of a private island escape in the heart of Mozambique’s Quirimbas Archipelago. With only 12 private villas fronting the Indian Ocean, Anantara brings rustic luxury to new heights. Dive the world-class waters of the surrounding marine park. Relax into soothing beachfront spa time. Indulge in a Robinson Crusoe-inspired picnic or captain your own sunset boat cruise.
content.text2: Uncover the romance of a private island escape in the heart of Mozambique’s Quirimbas Archipelago. With only 12 private villas fronting the Indian Ocean, Anantara brings rustic luxury to new heights. Dive the world-class waters of the surrounding marine park. Relax into soothing beachfront spa time. Indulge in a Robinson Crusoe-inspired picnic or captain your own sunset boat cruise.
content.features:
• A private island with only 12 beach pool villas
  • Reached by all-inclusive air transfer from Pemba
  • World-class diving, sailing, deep-sea fishing and water sports
  • Whale and dolphin watching
  • Island hopping

content.title: Al Baleed Resort Salalah
content.text:
Salalah’s first and only luxury pool villa resort blends the majesty of Oman’s fortresses with lush garden serenity. Coastal refinement refreshes with a private beach of white sands, invigorating water sports, drinks on a lounger at the infinity pool and dining beside the lagoon. 

Heritage stirs the senses in the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Al Baleed Archaeological Park, just next door. Spa luxuries heal with Salalah’s precious frankincense.
content.text2:
Salalah’s first and only luxury pool villa resort blends the majesty of Oman’s fortresses with lush garden serenity. Coastal refinement refreshes with a private beach of white sands, invigorating water sports, drinks on a lounger at the infinity pool and dining beside the lagoon. 

Heritage stirs the senses in the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Al Baleed Archaeological Park, just next door. Spa luxuries heal with Salalah’s precious frankincense.
content.features:
• 136 rooms, villas and pool villas
  • Private 250-metre beach
  • Infinity pool, freshwater lagoon and water sports
  • Next to Al Baleed Archaeological Park and the Museum of the Land of Frankincense

content.title: Al Jabal Al Akhdar Resort
content.text:
One of the highest located resorts in the world, Anantara Al Jabal Al Akhdar perches on the edge of a canyon in the Hajar Mountains of northern Oman. Boasting refreshing cool temperatures and blooming desert surrounding, the resort provides the perfect escape for ultimate unplugging and exploring. Visit cave villages, Damask rose valleys, and the nearby ruins of Niwza, once known as the Pearl of Islam. 

Savour Arab specialities in a fort tower, shisha as you stargaze, and private canyon dine where Princess Diana once stood. Unwind with sunrise yoga and  indigenous hammam rituals.
content.text2:
One of the highest located resorts in the world, Anantara Al Jabal Al Akhdar perches on the edge of a canyon in the Hajar Mountains of northern Oman. Boasting refreshing cool temperatures and blooming desert surrounding, the resort provides the perfect escape for ultimate unplugging and exploring. Visit cave villages, Damask rose valleys, and the nearby ruins of Niwza, once known as the Pearl of Islam. 

Savour Arab specialities in a fort tower, shisha as you stargaze, and private canyon dine where Princess Diana once stood. Unwind with sunrise yoga and  indigenous hammam rituals.
content.features:
• One of the world’s highest luxury resorts
  • 82 canyon view rooms and 33 private pool villas, including Oman’s most luxurious three bedroom pool villa
  • Canyon view platform where Princess Diana once stood

content.title: Vilamoura Resort
content.text: Anantara Vilamoura welcomes guests with an exciting new concept across two distinct areas – one designed especially for authentic family adventures, and the other exclusively for adults to enjoy intimate journeys of romance and privacy.
content.text2: Anantara Vilamoura welcomes guests with an exciting new concept across two distinct areas – one designed especially for authentic family adventures, and the other exclusively for adults to enjoy intimate journeys of romance and privacy.
content.features:
• Separate family and adults-only areas
  • 146 suites and rooms for families
  • 114 suites and rooms for adults
  • More than 5 restaurants and dining experiences for families and bars just for adults
  • Dedicated family -Cascades Pool&Bar- and adult pools -The Palms Pool&Bar
  • Views of Victoria Golf Course
  • Kids’ club with an adventurous activities calendar
  • Named “Best International Resort 2023” by Condé Nast Traveler Spain

content.title: Banana Island Resort
content.text: A private island just off the coast off Doha, Banana Island offers non-stop fun as well as beachside relaxation. Recharge with surfing, diving and F1 racing in world-class facilities. Hide away with blissful hammam treatments in the Middle East’s first and only resort wellness centre. Indulge in the romance of an over water villa perched over the Arabian Gulf.
content.text2: A private island just off the coast off Doha, Banana Island offers non-stop fun as well as beachside relaxation. Recharge with surfing, diving and F1 racing in world-class facilities. Hide away with blissful hammam treatments in the Middle East’s first and only resort wellness centre. Indulge in the romance of an over water villa perched over the Arabian Gulf.
content.features:
• 141 sea view rooms, suites, beach and over water pool villas
  • 800 m of golden shoreline
  • Surf pool, VIP cinema, bowling alley, mini putting golf course
  • Anantara Spa

content.title: Maia Seychelles
content.text: Revel in the splendour of the Seychelles from a luxurious hideaway nestled in the hillside of Mahé. Expansive villas offer a myriad of modern conveniences with custom design infused with island elements. Explore a range of gourmet cuisines with a choice of exquisite backdrops with our exclusive Dining by Design concept. Bask in the island sun by untouched sands and soak up the natural romance of the area. Refresh in your infinity pool or outdoor sunken bath as the sky explodes in colour. Escape reality for a holiday dream destination.
content.text2: Revel in the splendour of the Seychelles from a luxurious hideaway nestled in the hillside of Mahé. Expansive villas offer a myriad of modern conveniences with custom design infused with island elements. Explore a range of gourmet cuisines with a choice of exquisite backdrops with our exclusive Dining by Design concept. Bask in the island sun by untouched sands and soak up the natural romance of the area. Refresh in your infinity pool or outdoor sunken bath as the sky explodes in colour. Escape reality for a holiday dream destination.
content.features:
• 30 secluded private pool villas, with ocean and lush garden views
  • Dedicated Villa Host
  • Beachside sunset bar 
  • Award-winning wine list
  • Gourmet global flavours
  • Anantara Spa with open air pavilions
  • Yoga and wellness sessions
  • Island excursions
  • Bill Bensley-designed accommodation

content.title: Anantara Villa Padierna Palace Benahavís Marbella Resort
content.text: Retreat to an elegant sanctuary surrounded by three golf courses, a tranquil lake, Roman amphitheatre and more than 1,200 original works of art.
content.text2: Retreat to an elegant sanctuary surrounded by three golf courses, a tranquil lake, Roman amphitheatre and more than 1,200 original works of art.
content.features:
• 125 Elegant rooms, suites and villas
  • Surrounded by three golf courses
  • Extensive beauty, spa and wellness facilities
  • Spectacular Romanesque events spaces
  • Pet friendly – dogs and cats allowed

content.title: Kalutara Resort
content.text: Explore Sri Lanka’s myriad natural, historical and cultural attractions from a coastal base of swaying palms and tropical architecture. Tour the ancient citadel of Galle, spend the day at verdant tea plantations or the inspired gardens of Geoffrey Bawa. Situated on the southwest coast of the island just an hour from downtown Colombo, Anantara Kalutara Resort is set overlooking a tranquil lagoon where the Indian Ocean and the winding Kalu Ganga River meet. Luxuriate in beachfront paradise, enjoying authentic Sri Lankan hospitality.
content.text2: Explore Sri Lanka’s myriad natural, historical and cultural attractions from a coastal base of swaying palms and tropical architecture. Tour the ancient citadel of Galle, spend the day at verdant tea plantations or the inspired gardens of Geoffrey Bawa. Situated on the southwest coast of the island just an hour from downtown Colombo, Anantara Kalutara Resort is set overlooking a tranquil lagoon where the Indian Ocean and the winding Kalu Ganga River meet. Luxuriate in beachfront paradise, enjoying authentic Sri Lankan hospitality.
content.features:
• The only luxury resort in Sri Lanka with 360-degree ocean and lagoon views
  • Unique Indian Ocean and Kalu Ganga estuary frontage
  • 141 rooms, suites and pool villas
  • Geoffrey Bawa-inspired architecture
  • State-of-the-art conference and wedding facilities for intimate or large gatherings

content.title: Peace Haven Tangalle Resort
content.text: Located on the southern coast of Sri Lanka on a rocky outcrop facing the Indian Ocean, Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort boasts an enviably secluded setting. Pool villas dot lush grounds shaded by coconut palms. A beachfront infinity pool invites all-day unwinding. Surf the island's world-class waves. Dine cliffside. Indulge in a healing retreat with yoga, Ayurvedia spa treatments, wellness cuisine and Slumber Guru rituals.
content.text2: Located on the southern coast of Sri Lanka on a rocky outcrop facing the Indian Ocean, Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort boasts an enviably secluded setting. Pool villas dot lush grounds shaded by coconut palms. A beachfront infinity pool invites all-day unwinding. Surf the island's world-class waves. Dine cliffside. Indulge in a healing retreat with yoga, Ayurvedia spa treatments, wellness cuisine and Slumber Guru rituals.
content.features:
• 152 rooms and pool villas
  • 3-hour drive from Bandaranaike International Airport
  • Ayurvedic treatments at Anantara Spa
  • Spectacular cliffside dining
  • Access to historical, natural and cultural highlights

content.title: Sahara Tozeur Resort
content.text:
Head to the unexplored southwest of Tunisia for Saharan adventure and escape. There, Anantara Sahara Tozeur Resort & Villas rises up out of the desert, an oasis of luxury amidst breathtaking arid beauty. 

Trek across the landscape at dawn astride a camel. Explore abandoned villages and the 14th-century medina of the nearby town. Return to poolside basking, culinary adventures, and the bliss of ancient hammam rituals.
content.text2:
Head to the unexplored southwest of Tunisia for Saharan adventure and escape. There, Anantara Sahara Tozeur Resort & Villas rises up out of the desert, an oasis of luxury amidst breathtaking arid beauty. 

Trek across the landscape at dawn astride a camel. Explore abandoned villages and the 14th-century medina of the nearby town. Return to poolside basking, culinary adventures, and the bliss of ancient hammam rituals.
content.features:
• 93 suites, villas and pool villas
  • Saharan adventures and explorations
  • Arabian Nights culture and cuisine
  • Hammam spa rituals
  • Pet friendly - dogs and cats allowed

content.title: Desert Islands Resort
content.text: A unique blend of desert, beach and wildlife attractions accentuate this luxurious island retreat, located just off the Abu Dhabi coast in the sparkling Arabian Gulf. Wake at sunrise to bike along rugged terrain and trek across desert hinterlands. Encounter endangered wildlife on a leisurely drive through the private nature reserve, following rare Arabian Oryx and cheetahs as they roam the plains. Savour exotic Arab specialities and freshly caught seafood back at the resort, and revel in indigenous spa treatments.
content.text2: A unique blend of desert, beach and wildlife attractions accentuate this luxurious island retreat, located just off the Abu Dhabi coast in the sparkling Arabian Gulf. Wake at sunrise to bike along rugged terrain and trek across desert hinterlands. Encounter endangered wildlife on a leisurely drive through the private nature reserve, following rare Arabian Oryx and cheetahs as they roam the plains. Savour exotic Arab specialities and freshly caught seafood back at the resort, and revel in indigenous spa treatments.
content.features:
• 64 rooms, suites and pool villas overlooking the Arabian Gulf
  • Family-friendly adventures and water sports
  • World-class conference centre
  • Anantara Spa

Unforgettable adventure awaits on Sir Bani Yas Island

content.title: Al Yamm Resort
content.text: A rustic beachfront escape in the middle of the Arabian Gulf. Inspired by a traditional Emirati fishing village, 30 barasti-style villas line the beach of the eastern side of Sir Bani Yas Island. A tranquil lagoon teems with migratory birds, and is ripe for exploration by kayak. Indulge in pool villa romance. Dine on a shoreline reserved for two. Unwind with spa treatments overlooking the ocean.
content.text2: A rustic beachfront escape in the middle of the Arabian Gulf. Inspired by a traditional Emirati fishing village, 30 barasti-style villas line the beach of the eastern side of Sir Bani Yas Island. A tranquil lagoon teems with migratory birds, and is ripe for exploration by kayak. Indulge in pool villa romance. Dine on a shoreline reserved for two. Unwind with spa treatments overlooking the ocean.
content.features:
• 30 barasti-style villas
  • Pristine beachfront location
  • Mangrove and Arabian Gulf views
  • Spa beach cabana

content.title: Al Sahel Resort
content.text: Al Sahel brings the rugged beauty of lush savannah to the desert. Wake up to the sight of gazelle grazing in front of one of only 30 safari-style villas. Drive into the nature reserve for up-close encounters with wild giraffes and Arabian oryxes. Refresh with a traditional afternoon tea out in the grasslands. Dine by bonfire light on African tribal cuisine.
content.text2: Al Sahel brings the rugged beauty of lush savannah to the desert. Wake up to the sight of gazelle grazing in front of one of only 30 safari-style villas. Drive into the nature reserve for up-close encounters with wild giraffes and Arabian oryxes. Refresh with a traditional afternoon tea out in the grasslands. Dine by bonfire light on African tribal cuisine.
content.features:
• 30 safari-style villas
  • Wild savannah setting 
  • African-inspired dining experiences

content.title: Qasr Al Sarab Resort
content.text: In the heart of the Empty Quarter, an oasis of Arabian luxury is surrounded by endless dunes. Cross the world’s largest desert on a camel or race off dune bashing. After adventure, spa wellness refreshes with ancient hammam rituals and healing desert elixirs. Toast sunset from the seclusion of a private villa plunge pool. Feast on timeless Bedouin traditions and exceptional global tastes.
content.text2: In the heart of the Empty Quarter, an oasis of Arabian luxury is surrounded by endless dunes. Cross the world’s largest desert on a camel or race off dune bashing. After adventure, spa wellness refreshes with ancient hammam rituals and healing desert elixirs. Toast sunset from the seclusion of a private villa plunge pool. Feast on timeless Bedouin traditions and exceptional global tastes.
content.features:
• A secluded oasis 90 minutes from Abu Dhabi 
  • 140 rooms, 14 suites and 53 pool villas
  • Desert adventures 
  • Moroccan hammam and desert spa rituals 

Explore new experiences in the majestic palace. 
Discover more on our Anantara Times

content.title: Eastern Mangroves Hotel
content.text: Anantara Eastern Mangroves Abu Dhabi Hotel occupies a unique setting on the edge of Abu Dhabi in a protected mangrove reserve. Overlooking the sparkling waters of the Arabian Gulf, revel in Emirati opulence. Enjoy premium dining experiences, from signature Thai to Mediterranean flavours with an Arabian twist. Head out into the desert or shop at local souks. Treat yourself to an exclusive hammam experience at Anantara Spa.
content.text2: Anantara Eastern Mangroves Abu Dhabi Hotel occupies a unique setting on the edge of Abu Dhabi in a protected mangrove reserve. Overlooking the sparkling waters of the Arabian Gulf, revel in Emirati opulence. Enjoy premium dining experiences, from signature Thai to Mediterranean flavours with an Arabian twist. Head out into the desert or shop at local souks. Treat yourself to an exclusive hammam experience at Anantara Spa.
content.features:
• Unique mangrove setting on the edge of the city
  • 150 deluxe rooms, 66 Kasara Executive rooms, 6 suites
  • Signature dining
  • Award-winning Anantara Spa with Turkish hammam
  • Conference centre

content.title: The Palm Resort
content.text: One of Dubai's most iconic addresses is re-imagined in Anantara style, with the only over water villas in the UAE boasting traditional Thai architecture. Indulge in 400 m of private beach and lagoon pool access from your room. Head to the mainland to shop by longtail boat. Return to oceanfront dining and world-class spa treatments at Anantara Spa.
content.text2: One of Dubai's most iconic addresses is re-imagined in Anantara style, with the only over water villas in the UAE boasting traditional Thai architecture. Indulge in 400 m of private beach and lagoon pool access from your room. Head to the mainland to shop by longtail boat. Return to oceanfront dining and world-class spa treatments at Anantara Spa.
content.features:
• The only over water villas in the UAE
  • Three temperature-controlled swimming lagoons with direct access
  • Water sports and long-tail boat experience
  • Wellness programmes at Anantara Spa

content.title: Hoi An Resort
content.text: Unwind in an elegant riverfront retreat on the central coast of Vietnam. Located a short walk from the UNESCO World Heritage Site of historic Hoi An, colonial style infused with local cultural elements inspires graceful resort surrounds. Bike along winding streets to the beautiful An Bang Beach. Learn traditional customs including cooking, painting and lantern-making. Cruise the river at sunset, taking in scenes of local fishermen casting their nets.
content.text2: Unwind in an elegant riverfront retreat on the central coast of Vietnam. Located a short walk from the UNESCO World Heritage Site of historic Hoi An, colonial style infused with local cultural elements inspires graceful resort surrounds. Bike along winding streets to the beautiful An Bang Beach. Learn traditional customs including cooking, painting and lantern-making. Cruise the river at sunset, taking in scenes of local fishermen casting their nets.
content.features:
• 94 rooms and suites with split-level living area
  • Less than a kilometre from the historic old town
  • Riverfront dining
  • Heated pool
  • River cruises from our private jetty
  • The Vietage by Anantara luxury rail journeys

content.title: Mui Ne Resort
content.text: Two and half hours north of the capital, a lush beachfront retreat awaits. Hide away in a private pool villa overlooking the ocean, or get out and explore. Climb the blazing sand dunes for which the area is known. Learn to fish like a local. Indulge in cultural and culinary journeys unique to this part of Vietnam.
content.text2: Two and half hours north of the capital, a lush beachfront retreat awaits. Hide away in a private pool villa overlooking the ocean, or get out and explore. Climb the blazing sand dunes for which the area is known. Learn to fish like a local. Indulge in cultural and culinary journeys unique to this part of Vietnam.
content.features:
• 90 rooms, suites and private pool villas
  • Beachfront infinity pool and bar
  • 20 minutes from the Red Sand Dunes of Mui Ne, and 45 minutes from the White Sand Dunes
  • Two and a half hours’ drive from the resort to Ho Chi Minh City or the airport

content.title: Quy Nhon Villas
content.text: The East Sea coastline of Vietnam remains unexplored and lush. With now daily flights from Ho Chi Minh City, Hanoi and Hai Phong into the local airport, Anantara Quy Nhon Villas offers the perfect luxurious base from which to explore. Discover ancient Cham ruins rising up out the jungle. Set out on fishing adventures in one of the round coracle boats that famously dot the horizon. Return to your private villa for pool bliss and gourmet street eats served by your butler.
content.text2: The East Sea coastline of Vietnam remains unexplored and lush. With now daily flights from Ho Chi Minh City, Hanoi and Hai Phong into the local airport, Anantara Quy Nhon Villas offers the perfect luxurious base from which to explore. Discover ancient Cham ruins rising up out the jungle. Set out on fishing adventures in one of the round coracle boats that famously dot the horizon. Return to your private villa for pool bliss and gourmet street eats served by your butler.
content.features:
• 26 beachfront and ocean view luxury pool villas overlooking a private cove  
  • Private dining experiences featuring fresh seafood, gourmet street eats and picnics 
  • In-villa martial arts, water sports, local excursions, Vietnamese cooking classes
  • Cliffside jungle spa
  • The Vietage by Anantara Luxury Rail Journey

content.title: Royal Livingstone Hotel
content.text: The Royal Livingstone brings plush luxury to a wild setting, with free unlimited access to the Victoria Falls, and tranquil gardens fronting the Zambezi River. Wake up to the sight of zebras roaming our grounds from your verandah. Head out on safari and then return to a traditional afternoon tea.
content.text2: The Royal Livingstone brings plush luxury to a wild setting, with free unlimited access to the Victoria Falls, and tranquil gardens fronting the Zambezi River. Wake up to the sight of zebras roaming our grounds from your verandah. Head out on safari and then return to a traditional afternoon tea.
content.features:
• Free Unlimited Access to Victoria Falls.
  • Wildlife roaming the grounds
  • Massage experiences beside the Zambezi River
  • River safaris
  • Helicopter waterfall excursions
  • Butler service

content.title: Anantara The Marker Dublin Hotel
content.text: Discover the vibrant capital, where Georgian streets brimming with century-old pubs contrast with the sleek architecture of Europe’s financial and tech hubs. Located in the Docklands overlooking the waterfront, Anantara The Marker Dublin Hotel provides the perfect setting to explore, retreat and enjoy the finer things in life.
content.text2: Discover the vibrant capital, where Georgian streets brimming with century-old pubs contrast with the sleek architecture of Europe’s financial and tech hubs. Located in the Docklands overlooking the waterfront, Anantara The Marker Dublin Hotel provides the perfect setting to explore, retreat and enjoy the finer things in life.
content.features:
• 187 guest rooms and suites
  • Ideal location in the cosmopolitan Docklands
  • Award winning Forbes Street by Gareth Mullins and rooftop bar & terrace
  • Luxurious spa with 23 metre infinity pool
  • Jacuzzi, sauna, eucalyptus infused steam room and gym
  • Nine meeting rooms
  • Rooftop weddings and receptions
  • Complimentary high-speed WiFi

content.title: Palazzo Naiadi Rome
content.text: Rome beckons with its churches and palaces, and Anantara offers up one of its own: the historic Palazzo Naiadi overlooking the Piazza della Repubblica. Wander to the Pantheon through cobbled lanes, stopping along the way at the Trevi Fountain and its famous gelato store. Return to rooftop relaxation, with a soak in the pool and a cocktail as the sun sets over the Eternal City.
content.text2: Rome beckons with its churches and palaces, and Anantara offers up one of its own: the historic Palazzo Naiadi overlooking the Piazza della Repubblica. Wander to the Pantheon through cobbled lanes, stopping along the way at the Trevi Fountain and its famous gelato store. Return to rooftop relaxation, with a soak in the pool and a cocktail as the sun sets over the Eternal City.
content.features:
• 232 guest rooms and suites
  • Historic architecture
  • Ideal central location
  • Rooftop terrace and pool
  • Pet friendly – dogs and cats allowed

content.title: New York Palace Budapest
content.text: Located in the heart of the historical downtown, Anantara New York Palace Budapest Hotel is a vision of cultured sophistication. Wander the banks of the Danube, lined with magnificent castles and churches, then return to the opulence of New York Café, named “the most beautiful café in the world” for its Belle Epoque design of gold chandeliers and marble arches.
content.text2: Located in the heart of the historical downtown, Anantara New York Palace Budapest Hotel is a vision of cultured sophistication. Wander the banks of the Danube, lined with magnificent castles and churches, then return to the opulence of New York Café, named “the most beautiful café in the world” for its Belle Epoque design of gold chandeliers and marble arches.
content.features:
• Located in the historical downtown of Budapest
  • Easy access to metro, tram and bus
  • 185 guestrooms and suites
  • Anantara Spa, indoor pool and gym facilities
  • Palatial events for up to 500 guests
  • Pet friendly - dogs and cats allowed
